title: The ideal space to balance life, work, and play.♦♦
posting_body: ['Find the Perfect Apartment', 'This charming Mountain View apartment community is centrally located amongst the top Silicon Valley companies and makes the perfect home for the techie.', 'Select a home from an array of generously sized studios and two bedroom floor plans.', 'All feature contemporary kitchens with designer fixtures, built-in microwave and dishwasher, ceiling fans, air conditioning and plenty of linen and closet space.', 'Outside, go for a swim in the sparkling swimming pool or relax in our beautifully landscaped grounds.', '-Barbecue Area', '-Bicycle Storage', '-On-Site Management', '-On-Site Maintenance', '-Resort-Style Swimming Pool', '-Convenient to 101, 280, 237, 85', '-Additional Storage Available', '-Laundry Care Centers', '-Courtesy Patrol', '-Garage, Carports, Lot Available', '-Healthy', 'Living: All Common Areas Are Non-Smoking', '-Microwave', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.']
